Tuscaloosa.Hillcrest High School (Tuscaloosa, Alaba: Hillcrest High School is public high school near Tuscaloosa, Alabama, USA. The school is located in the unincorporated suburban area south of Tuscaloosa informally known as Taylorville. The school is administered by the Tuscaloosa County School System under the authority of the Alabama State Department of Education. The school currently enrolls around 1250 students in grades 9-12 and has a faculty of 75 teachers.
